landing.thanks: Thank you for your interest in meeting me
landing.message: I invite you to enter for continue know me.

AboutMe.bodyOne: As I told you, I am going to introduce myself.
AboutMe.bodyTwo: I am a Full Stack Developer.  But that's not something I haven't told you before. I am passionate about knowledge, I believe that interest and persistence are the key to learning anything, and I have plenty of both.
AboutMe.bodyThree: I am passionate and challenged to learn new things.
AboutMe.bodyFour: Programming gives me interested and curious to know.  It is a very wide world in which new technologies, new versions or new tools are constantly emerging.  This constant change always keeps me entertained and wanting to improve myself.
AboutMe.bodyFive: I can't assure you that I know everything, but what I can assure you is that I will be insistent.  I'm going to ask, I'm going to investigate and I'm not going to stop until I learn what I need.
AboutMe.bodySix: I like to work in a team, I feel that in this way there is double teaching, both the one who helps and the one who receives the help learn.
AboutMe.bodySeven: Outside of programming, I am a social person, I like to share moments with my friends and family.  Also, I like to travel to disconnect.

proyects.title: What I Do
proyects.descriptionCountries: In the application you can search for different countries in the world and enter the details for more information. In addition, it has a controlled form to create tourist activities and associate them with different countries. This application has an entire CRUD regarding tourist activities. It is they can see, create, edit and delete. The country data is brought from a rest API (https://restcountries.com) and stored in my own database
proyects.descriptionhenry: It is an ecommerce that allows us to navigate through 3 roles: Guest, User and Admin. As a guest you can browse the entire web, see books and their details but you cannot buy until you are authenticated. As a user you can buy and search for books, access the user panel, leave reviews of the purchased book and save books in fav. As admin you can have control of the entire application through the administrator panel.
